item.titolo: Eintracht Francoforte-Napoli 0-2 diretta: Osimhen e Di Lorenzo firmano il successo azzurro - Corriere dello Sport
item.testo: A data template is now configured to accept both Title and URL node values, displaying each in its own TextBlock. For purposes of layout, we have arranged these in a single StackPanel. The Binding tag and XPath attribute have been used to define the specific XML nodes we are interested in pulling data from.
